responsibilities: Solve hard problems in the fields of machine learning, time-series analysis, NLP, and generative AI
Work directly with Sentry’s novel (and massive) dataset of errors, spans, and profiles
Own the development of major initiatives
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities mention solving hard problems in machine learning, NLP, and generative AI, which are closely related to the fine-tuning and customization of language models. However, there is no explicit mention of training or fine-tuning large language models for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities focus more on working with datasets and developing major initiatives, which may not directly involve fine-tuning language models.
